summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.7°C) and outside temperature (down 10.5°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 329 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles), cloud levels (up 217 m), and outside humidity (down 5%) when compared to today.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 425m to a maximum of 1526m, averaging 623.6m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 835.9m and 841.0m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and gentle light winds are expected. A few light raindrops may fall, fog or low cloud is expected, and it’s dim outside. Little change in the weather.
